questions.quote: Y'know I have some friends who try and base their whole life on that principle.
This is a pretty bad deal for Kramer. You know a radar detector is worth much more than that helmet. I think you're cheating him.
I'll tell you a little secret. We're having an unadvertised sale starting Friday, that suit will be half-price.
I don't have a dress to wear.  And you. You don't have anything.
What about Don Ramsey? You didn't mention anything to him did you?
I just talked to Mr. Kruger, he'll be down in a minute. He wanted me to take a photograph for the record.
Someone's have to unhook the boat before it leaves...the place!
I don't want to see this woman anymore but I haven't got the will power to throw out her number. Please, help me. Help me.
Yes. In Chinatown with the money I earned cleaning people's apartments.
I needed them to help me break my fall! If it hadn't been for them, I could have really injured myself!
